title: Taking offers on various George Gibson cards.
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Taking offers on various George Gibson cards.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Morning Everyone,

   Have decided to press forward with my collecting 'shift of focus'.  As such, I am clearing out the last cards of my Gibson collection that I'll be selling.

I am taking offers on the following George Gibson cards.  Nothing reasonable will be refused.

E254 Colgan Chip (RAW)
T332 Helmar Stamp (RAW)
E101 Anonymous (RAW)
T201 Mecca (PSA 7)
W555 (RAW)

Front/back scans of everything can be seen at [url]http://www.moongibson.com/gallery.php[/url]
Email me at richard@richardarmstrong.ca if you're interested in anything.

Thanks!

Richard.

Updated to reflect sales.
